<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Triggers </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Synchronizes the waypoint with other waypoints. Each waypoint is given as an array [group, index]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint '''synchronizeWaypoint''' [waypoint1, waypoint2, ...] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [waypoint1, waypoint2, ...]: [[Array]] of waypoints </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> waypoint1: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> waypoint2: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_group1, 2] [[synchronizeWaypoint]] [ [_group2, 3] ];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

<dt class="note">[[User:Master85|Master85]]<dd class="note"><br>
To 'unsynchronize' a waypoint use: [[Waypoint]] '''synchronizeWaypoint''' []<br>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
